group_1.textRight: I see, I see...
For now Iroha's group is alive.
Well that's nice an' all, but the difficult part is...
The [textYellow:Kimochi] are balancin' out each side's power...@was it.

group_1.textLeft: "Difficult"...@We're also at a disadvantage.

group_1.textRight: I can't say for sure yet,
but originally these things were meant for lotsa@Magical Girls ta be fightin' over...
Now that the number a' Magical Girls that are@allowed ta join in is limited...

group_1.textLeft: Things are not going as planned now...

group_1.textRight: Plans can go wrong, though.
'Ta think somethin' like this would derail us,
it's completely unexpected.@Just what are these [textYellow:Kimochi] thinkin'?

group_1.textLeft: Speaking of unexpected, I did make one mistake.

group_1.textRight: Eh, there was somethin' else?

group_1.textLeft: When we heard about this...@We were taken by surprise.
I told Miss Kisaki and her companions that this@was a situation we would never have expected...

group_1.textRight: Then they already know?
Well, don't ya worry about that.@There's no reason ta be vain about it.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much.

group_1.textRight: Anyways, I appreciate the information ya gave me,
though I thought ya'd be more cautious about it.

group_1.textLeft: My gentle persuasion strategy was...@Not exactly successful.
Those girls insisted I talk to them.
They were wary of me, but still wanted to talk,
so I think they just sought more information.

group_1.textRight: That's great, ya observed their facial expressions@correctly.
So, ya think ya helped them out by listenin'@ta them?

group_1.textLeft: ...I am not sure.
Everyone at the consultation office knows that@we don't know anything,
which...left them very disappointed.
Also...
That so...
Guess it's something the peeps at Puella Care@don't know about either.
And I was hoping to ask you about the Magical Girls@that were selected...

group_1.textRight: I was not able to meet your expectations.@I am terribly sorry.
Fumu~...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, don't apologize for that.

group_1.textRight: If I may, could I ask one more question?

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: Was the coffee...not to your liking?

group_1.textLeft: Eh?!

group_1.textRight: None of you have been drinking for a while now...

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry.

group_1.textRight: It's not like that...

group_1.textLeft: Those girls...didn't finish their coffee.
